text: Fayette County is a county in Illinois. One source states that Fayette County was created on February 14, 1812, but it was really created in 1821 by combining Bond, Clark, and Crawford counties. The French hero of the American Revolutionary War, the Marquis de LaFayette, was honored with the name. ==References== Category:Illinois counties Category:1821 establishments in Illinois
title: Fayette County, Illinois
